content:
This chunk is part of the Panda3D documentation explaining how to manage dynamic obstacles in the pathfinding system, highlighting the functionality and performance considerations when adding moving obstacles to the navigation mesh.

addDynamicObstacle(NodePath obstacle);

This functions work similar to addStaticObstacle except that in this case the obstacles can move and are not static. This is more processor heavy so if your object is not moving, use the prior instead.

mesh-generation static-obstacles dynamic-obstacles uneven-terrain
